typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Employee_Name as string,
		EmpID as string,
		MarriedID as string,
		DeptID as string,
		PayRate as string,
		PositionID as string,
		Position as string,
		State as string,
		DOB as string,
		Sex as string,
		DateofHire as string,
		Department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	dateFormats: ['yyyy-MM-dd'],
	timestampFormats: ['yyyy-MM-dd'],
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer',
	preferredFractionalType: 'double',
	wildcardPaths:['HR/*.csv']) ~> hrdatacsv
hrdatacsv derive(Age = abs(year(currentDate())-year(toDate(byName('DOB'),'MM/dd/yyyy'))),
		HireDate = toDate(byName('DateofHire'), 'MM/dd/yyyy')) ~> DerivedColumns
DerivedColumns select(mapColumn(
		Employee_Name,
		EmpID,
		MarriedID,
		DeptID,
		PayRate,
		PositionID,
		Position,
		State,
		DOB,
		Sex,
		DateofHire,
		Department,
		Age,
		HireDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		Employee_Name as string,
		EmpID as integer,
		MarriedID as boolean,
		DeptID as string,
		PayRate as string,
		PositionID as string,
		Position as string,
		State as string,
		DOB as string,
		Sex as string,
		DateofHire as date,
		Department as string,
		Age as integer
	),
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'rawdata',
	folderPath: 'HR/delta',
	truncate:true,
	mergeSchema: true,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		Employee_Name,
		EmpID,
		MarriedID,
		DeptID,
		PayRate,
		PositionID,
		Position,
		State,
		DOB,
		Sex,
		DateofHire = HireDate,
		Department,
		Age
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> hrdeltalake
